professional_summary: Software Engineer with a strong foundation in structured system design, clean architecture, and disciplined development workflows. I focus on building solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and aligned to long-term business requirements. With experience across academic and professional environments, I apply consistent engineering principles—clarity in design, predictability in execution, and efficiency in delivery. Known for a calm, analytical approach to problem-solving and the ability to translate complex requirements into stable, production-ready software.

Applied clean architecture principles to improve system modularity and reduce technical debt. Strengthened API integrations for logistics operations and supported team workflows through disciplined version control, structured documentation, and consistent communication. Maintained a focus on platform reliability, predictable behaviour, and maintainable codebases.

Supported server-side application development with a focus on architectural consistency, reliability, and maintainable coding practices. Participated in code reviews to ensure clean logic, stable deployments, and adherence to standards. Worked with clients and team leads to translate requirements into technical tasks, ensuring clarity in execution and reducing development ambiguity.

Training in network fundamentals, infrastructure configuration, and business intelligence systems, providing a strong base for understanding real-world system environments and technical ecosystems.
